channel.title: Cyril Leger PODCAST
channel.description:
Every month get a new Podcast and
WELCOME TO MY WORLD...
channel.itunes:author: Cyril Léger
channel.itunes:subtitle: Every month get a new Podcast and WELCOME TO MY WORLD...
channel.itunes:summary: Every month get a new Podcast and WELCOME TO MY WORLD...

item.title: It's Time To Leave...
item.description:
Playlist:

1. Movida 005
2. Baraso - The Beginning - Leix & Samu remix
3. Anish - Desert Loving - Alex Lario Remix
4. Dazed Dolls - a
5. Alex Danilov - Look Around
6. Moodymanc - Black Paint - Larry Heard's After Dark Mix
7. Franco Bianco - Gris Cubico - Seuil Remix
8. Claude Monnet & Torre Bros - Sassorow - Claude Monnet Dub Vision
9. Hang on a second
10. Der Schmeisser - Schone_Zeit Timo Jahns Remix
11. Marco Carola - Groove Catcher - Martin Buttrich Groove Remix

For more infos:
www.myspace.com/cyrileger
or
cyrileger@gmail.com

item.title: Extra Light
item.description:
Playlist:

1. Mirko Loko - Love Harmonic - Carl Craig's Soundscape Remix
2. Rene Breitbarth - Sphere - Jay Tripwire Edit
3. Trickski - The Warm Up
4. Cyril Léger - Adn = 2 Jesus
5. Ripperton - Amarone
6. Chris Lattner - Golden Palace - Groove Edit
7. Portishead - Nicolas Duvoisin - Re-edit
8. Daria - Gauchito Gil
9. Björk - Play Dead - Cyril léger Close to Heaven Edit
10. David Squillace - The Other Side Of Bed

For more infos:
www.myspace.com/cyrileger
or
cyrileger@gmail.com

item.title: Blue Velvet

11.Gnanmankoudgi - Cyril Léger Remix - Laurent Garnier

item.title: Teck Your Breath Vol 4
item.description:
Playlist:

1. El Paso Yapacc rmx - Daso & Pawas
2. I'm From Hell - Taster Peter
3. Cantonese Woman Andréa Roma rmx - Mikael Jonasson & Ricky Stone
4. Debauchery Dancer - Obi Baby
5. Spektral - Matt Nordstrom & Orlando Villegas rmx
6. Breakfast In Bag - Carlo Lio
7. Paradigm House - Maetrik
8. Pravim Haos - Umek
9. Club Zanzibar - Tom Hades
10.Time And Space - Miniminds
11. Do You Want It - Mescal Kid
